name: CLKComplicationTemplateGraphicExtraLargeCircularClosedGaugeText
desc: A template for displaying text inside an extra-large closed circular gauge.

items.name: init(gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider, centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider)
items.desc: Creates a new template with a closed circular gauge with text in the center.

items.name: var centerTextProvider: CLKTextProvider
items.desc: The text to display in the center of the gauge.

items.name: var gaugeProvider: CLKGaugeProvider
items.desc: The gauge to display in the complication.
